AddressBook.author: aljawaid
AddressBook.description:
Use the dedicated Address Book to create and manage contacts or organisations in projects and tasks. Add custom properties to standardise a deeper relationship between tasks and people or places. 
 
 Contacts can be linked exclusively to tasks in a project. Users can sort their contact properties to show the first 3 properties (e.g. name, number and email) for quick reference from the task summary and the project board view.
AddressBook.title: AddressBook

AddShortcuts.author: Tagirijus
AddShortcuts.description: A plugin, which adds certain shortcuts to Kanboard.
AddShortcuts.title: AddShortcuts

AddSpentTime.author: Tagirijus
AddSpentTime.description: Adds a button for a task to quickly add spent time with an time-input prompt.
AddSpentTime.title: AddSpentTime

AgileIndicators.author: aljawaid
AgileIndicators.description: Agile Indicators display the measurements for Task Priorities and Task Complexities in an easy to use general format. Task Priorities are scaled between P1 and P5 whilst Task Complexities are scored as 0-50.
AgileIndicators.title: AgileIndicators

ApplicationBranding.author: aljawaid
ApplicationBranding.description:
This plugin will rename your installation to 'My Workspace' (or a custom name) and include matching device favicons, description and logo in the site metadata for a better user experience. 
 
 Users will experience a revamped login page, security page and password reminder page, with a new Admin Dashboard showing global installation activity data with corrected page titles will give a more professional appeal across the site and when sharing links.
ApplicationBranding.title: ApplicationBranding

assigncategory.author: David Morlitz
assigncategory.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to set the category on a card when moved to a specified column.
assigncategory.title: Assign category when moving cards to specified column

assigndate.author: David Morlitz
assigndate.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to set a due date on undated cards to allow card to appear on calendar and ICS feed.
assigndate.title: Assign date to undated cards

assignduedatecolumn.author: Jacob Charles Wilson
assignduedatecolumn.description: Adds an automatic action which allows you to set a due date (relative to the current time in days) on a card when moved to a specified column.
assignduedatecolumn.title: Assign due date when moving cards to specified column

AttachDocumentsforViewers.author: Franklin Hernandez
AttachDocumentsforViewers.description: This plugin will allow Project Viewers to attach documents to tasks.
AttachDocumentsforViewers.title: Attach Documents for Project Viewers

autoemailactions.author: Craig Crosby
autoemailactions.description: Add the automatic actions to send a task by email to the creator or assignee of the task. Also included are actions to send a notification via email when a task or subtask due date is impending within a duration or overdue.
autoemailactions.title: Auto Email Extended Actions

AutomaticActionUX.author: aljawaid
AutomaticActionUX.description: This plugin gives the Automatic Action interface a complete makeover to make it more user friendly. Particularly useful for visual learners and non-English speaking users, this plugin adds a quick glance of Actions on the board avoiding careless drag-happy mistakes.
AutomaticActionUX.title: AutomaticActionUX

autosubtasks.author: Craig Crosby
autosubtasks.description: Automatic Action to create subtasks when a task is created or moves column.
autosubtasks.title: Auto Subtask Creation

backlog.author: vistree + creecros
backlog.description: Plugin to add a backlog column with full height to the project board.
backlog.title: Backlog

Bak2topbotm.author: Craig Crosby
Bak2topbotm.description: Back to Top and Bottom buttons for the task summary.
Bak2topbotm.title: Bak2topbotm

bigboard.author: BlueTeck, Thomas Stinner, Pierre Cadeot, PapeCoding, Chaosmeister, Jieiku
bigboard.description: An interface that can display multiple projects.
bigboard.title: Bigboard

bitbucket-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
bitbucket-webhook.description:
Bind [Bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org) webhook events to Kanboard Automatic Actions. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
bitbucket-webhook.title: Bitbucket Webhook

Boardcustomizer.author: BlueTeck, Craig Crosby, Jake G
Boardcustomizer.description: Customize the board and card style per user.
Boardcustomizer.title: Boardcustomizer

Budget.author: Frédéric Guillot
Budget.description: Add a budget section for projects and expense reports based on user hourly rates.
Budget.title: Budget

cardpushdate.author: David Morlitz
cardpushdate.description: Place easy actions on task cards, searches and the dashboard - including updating the card date, show comments, edit, close and moving the card.
cardpushdate.title: Card Push Date and other actions

cas-auth.author: Jamaïca Servier
cas-auth.description:
Use CAS as an authentication provider. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin may require extra configuration to your application.
cas-auth.title: CAS Authentication

ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn.author: Manfred Hoffmann
ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn.description: Adds an Automatic Action that allows you to clear the due date of tasks in a specific column which haven't been moved during a given period.
ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn.title: ClearDueDateTaskNotMovedColumn

ColorManager.author: aljawaid
ColorManager.description: Use a new way to utilise colors to their full potential in Kanboard.  Choose from 3 color palettes or create your own. Across all palettes, choose from over 85 colors to match your workflow across the entire interface.
ColorManager.title: ColorManager

comment-tooltip.author: Enrico Frigo
comment-tooltip.description: Show a task's comments as a tooltip as in older kanboard version.
comment-tooltip.title: Comment Tooltip

CommentActions.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
CommentActions.description: This plugin gives the ability to assign the actual task (directly in the comment-create section) to one of the users in project.
CommentActions.title: Comment Actions

commentonly.author: Craig Crosby
commentonly.description: Add commenting abilities for Project Viewers.
commentonly.title: Comment Only Restrictions for Project Viewers

CompletedComplexity.author: Andrew Cziryak
CompletedComplexity.description: Add tracking of Completed Complexity of tasks over dates in a date range. This chart shows the completed complexity (throughput) of tasks moved into the right-most column over the time interval.
CompletedComplexity.title: Completed Complexity

ContentCleaner.author: aljawaid
ContentCleaner.description: This tool allows admins to cleanup their Kanboard database by selectively deleting useless data saved by Kanboard and leftover data after uninstalling plugins. Keep your database clean and free from cluttered and expired data using cleaning jobs to solve specific application issues.
ContentCleaner.title: ContentCleaner

CostControl.author: aljawaid
CostControl.description:
Use the new Cost Control section to enable currencies and budgeting in Kanboard. Get live currency rates automatically for over 120 currencies allowing users to compare with manually saved rates. Using this plugin enables projects to have an associated cost element.  
 
 ⚠️  This plugin _replaces and extends_ the features from the original [Budget](https://github.com/kanboard/plugin-budget) plugin.
CostControl.title: CostControl

coverimage.author: BlueTeck + creecros
coverimage.description: This plugin adds a cover image function to tasks on the board and allows you to set a project image to use as a logo for projects.
coverimage.title: Coverimage

creecros_filter_pack.author: Craig Crosby
creecros_filter_pack.description: Creecros Filter Pack. Request new filters on issue board.
creecros_filter_pack.title: Creecros_Filter_Pack

customizer.author: Craig Crosby
customizer.description: A new GUI to add logos, themes, favicons and much more customization.
customizer.title: Customizer

CustomUserCSS.author: Sebastian Pape
CustomUserCSS.description: Adds a setting for custom CSS per user.
CustomUserCSS.title: CustomUserCSS

DashboardTaskSorting.author: Tagirijus
DashboardTaskSorting.description:
DashboardTaskSorting changes the default sorting logic for tasks on the main dashboard for both the overview and the tasks site to: 
 1. Due Date ASC 
 2. Priority DESC
DashboardTaskSorting.title: DashboardTaskSorting

db-storage.author: Frédéric Guillot
db-storage.description: This plugin stores uploaded files into the database instead of using the local filesystem.
db-storage.title: Database Storage

DefinitionOfDone.author: Tomas Dittmann
DefinitionOfDone.description:
This plugin adds a simple checklist to the taskview, similar to subtasks. Each entry consists of a title, a description and a toggleable '**done**' field. 
 
 ⚠️  Compatible with [MarkdownPlus](https://github.com/creecros/MarkdownPlus/releases)
DefinitionOfDone.title: Definition of Done

duedate.author: JustFxDev (Fx)
duedate.description: Switch sorting cards in all columns by card due date, last modification of tasks or default view.
duedate.title: Due Date sorting

EAR.author: Tomas Dittmann
EAR.description: Add a button on attachments that allows you to rename them.
EAR.title: Enable attachment renaming

EmbedAnything.author: greyaz
EmbedAnything.description: Embed anything into Kanboard. This plugin utilizes HTML iframes and allows you to embed any web content into your project as a standalone page.
EmbedAnything.title: EmbedAnything

encryptedcontent.author: Valentino Pesce
encryptedcontent.description: This plugin allows the insertion of text content encrypted in the kanboard database, with the use of random keys.
encryptedcontent.title: EncryptedContent

essential.author: Valentino Pesce
essential.description: Essential theme returns a new style to your Kanboard.
essential.title: Essential

EssentialTheme.author: Valentino Pesce, Alfred Bühler
EssentialTheme.description:
A modern theme for Kanboard, returning a new style to your instance. 
 
 ⚠️  Replaces [Essential](https://github.com/kenlog/Essential) theme.
EssentialTheme.title: EssentialTheme

extendedMail.author: Rens Sikma
extendedMail.description: Adds extra functionality to Kanboard comment by email.
extendedMail.title: extendedMail

FontSwitcher.author: aljawaid
FontSwitcher.description:
Choose a new font style from a variety of self-hosted fonts replacing the default 'Helvetica Neue' (Mac), and 'Arial' (Windows) fonts to a different typeface giving your application a fresh new look. 
 
 Improve readability and reduce eye strain by choosing from different styles of sans-serif fonts or select an article-type serif type or even a code-type monospace style. Font styles are applied instantly across the site for all users.
FontSwitcher.title: FontSwitcher

gantt.author: Frédéric Guillot
gantt.description: Gantt charts for tasks and projects.
gantt.title: Gantt

gitea-webhook.author: Chris Metz
gitea-webhook.description:
Connect [Gitea](https://gitea.io/en-us/) webhook events to Kanboard Automatic Actions. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
gitea-webhook.title: Gitea Webhook

github-auth.author: Frédéric Guillot
github-auth.description:
Use [GitHub](https://github.com) as an authentication provider. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
github-auth.title: Github Authentication

github-release-notifier.author: Shaun Fong
github-release-notifier.description:
Kanboard Plugin to a create task when [GitHub](https://github.com) release. 
 
 ⚠️  Requires GitHub webhooks to be configured for a project. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
github-release-notifier.title: Github Release Notifier

github-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
github-webhook.description:
Connect [GitHub](https://github.com) webhook events to Kanboard Automatic Actions. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
github-webhook.title: Github Webhook

gitlab-auth.author: Frédéric Guillot
gitlab-auth.description:
Use [GitLab](https://gitlab.com) as an authentication provider. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
gitlab-auth.title: Gitlab Authentication

gitlab-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
gitlab-webhook.description:
Connect [GitLab](https://gitlab.com) webhook events to Kanboard Automatic Actions. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
gitlab-webhook.title: Gitlab Webhook

Glancer.author: aljawaid
Glancer.description:
Following the 'Getting Things Done' methodology, productive users can glance through their workflow easily. 
 
 Quickly jump to a project, task or comment through a bar at the bottom of the screen. Use the new copy to clipboard feature in different formats coupled with the new global shortcut icon to realise why Glancer was built for power users.
Glancer.title: Glancer

gogs-webhook.author: Frédéric Guillot
gogs-webhook.description:
Connect [Gogs](https://gogs.io) webhook events to Kanboard Automatic Actions. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
gogs-webhook.title: Gogs Webhook

google-auth.author: Frédéric Guillot
google-auth.description:
Use [Google](https://github.com/google/google-authenticator/wiki) as an authentication provider. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
google-auth.title: Google Authentication

GrabScroll.author: Ramón Cahenzli
GrabScroll.description: Click and drag anywhere on your Kanboard to scroll horizontally.
GrabScroll.title: GrabScroll

Greenwing.author: Confexion
Greenwing.description: Greenwing is a Kanboard beautify theme with a modern design.
Greenwing.title: Greenwing

group_assign.author: Craig Crosby
group_assign.description: Add group assignment and additional assignees multiselect option to tasks.
group_assign.title: Group_assign

Group_owners.author: Cyboulette
Group_owners.description: Allows application managers to create and manage their groups by themselves.
Group_owners.title: Group_owners

highlightcodesyntax.author: Valentino Pesce
highlightcodesyntax.description: For code snippets the plugin is able to highlight code syntax in more than 151 languages including PHP, JavaScript, Python, HTML and CSS.
highlightcodesyntax.title: HighlightCodeSyntax

HoursView.author: Tagirijus
HoursView.description: Show total hours in different places in the Kanboard application.
HoursView.title: HoursView

ICalConfig.author: Alfred Bühler
ICalConfig.description: Allow some configuration of the iCal calendar feeds.
ICalConfig.title: ICalConfig

imapuserauth.author: Jim Mason
imapuserauth.description: Login to Kanboard using your IMAP credentials.
imapuserauth.title: IMAP User Authentication

importwithgroup.author: Craig Crosby
importwithgroup.description: Adds a group name field to Import via CSV.
importwithgroup.title: ImportWithGroup

instantactions.author: Jens Heuschkel
instantactions.description: Add buttons to tasks in board view for edit, delete and close them.
instantactions.title: Instant Actions for Kanboard Tasks

jabber.author: Frédéric Guillot
jabber.description:
Receive individual or project notifications on [Jabber](https://www.jabber.org) servers. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
jabber.title: Jabber

KADIFF.author: Tomas Dittmann
KADIFF.description:
Show a side-by-side difference (where applicable) in the activity streams. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin may require extra configuration to your application.
KADIFF.title: Activity Diff

KanboardCSS.author: aljawaid
KanboardCSS.description:
This pure CSS theme replaces the look and feel of the Kanboard user interface. For modern browsers using gradients and shades of blue and red, KanboardCSS refreshes the the user experience. 
 
 A new animated notification icon easily identifies new messages without affecting browser performance. All tables and forms are restyled to save screen space and improve productivity. Install with [FontSwitcher](https://github.com/aljawaid/FontSwitcher) to give a complete new overhaul to your application.
KanboardCSS.title: KanboardCSS

KanboardEmailHistory.author: aljawaid
KanboardEmailHistory.description:
This plugin adds a new Automatic Action to provide any user or department to receive a final email report when a task is closed. Automatic emails are sent detailing the task description including the full comment history. 
 
 Let this plugin create a digital file copy of your tasks using advanced options including emailing different recipients, adding comment logs and a fallback for a blank email subject line. Digital file copies can also be useful in environments where auditing is required.
KanboardEmailHistory.title: KanboardEmailHistory

KanboardEssentials.author: Taeluf
KanboardEssentials.description: Adds many quality of life features, like edit buttons on columns and cards, among others.
KanboardEssentials.title: Kanboard Essentials

KanboardPermalink.author: Theobald Software GmbH, aljawaid
KanboardPermalink.description: Adds a convenient link to copy the task url to the clipboard.
KanboardPermalink.title: KanboardPermalink

KanboardProjectInvitation.author: Andrei Volgin / Hussein Khalil, ipunkt Business Solutions
KanboardProjectInvitation.description: Plugin is used to invite new users to actual Project by typing user's email. Input for invitation is located in `Project Settings -> Permissions`.
KanboardProjectInvitation.title: Project Invitation

KanboardSkeletonPlugin.author: aljawaid
KanboardSkeletonPlugin.description: This template repository is the basic structure of a Kanboard Plugin. Download and use any part of this repository to create and develop your own Kanboard plugin. Developers should use the live repository instead of the latest release for the most up to date changes.
KanboardSkeletonPlugin.title: KanboardSkeletonPlugin

KanboardSupport.author: aljawaid
KanboardSupport.description:
This plugin shows a dedicated section to display the environment and configuration settings allowing users to quickly troubleshoot issues without having to open core files. 
 
 Display or share configurations to identify problems across the application in a user-friendly format. Helpful tips, webhook documentation and access to view the default and current config files from within the interface are just some of the features included in this powerful plugin. 
 
 Works smoothly with [PluginManager](https://github.com/aljawaid/PluginManager) and [ContentCleaner](https://github.com/aljawaid/ContentCleaner).
KanboardSupport.title: KanboardSupport

kangaroojump.author: Valentino Pesce
kangaroojump.description: You can switch from one task to another by entering number on any page of your Kanboard.
kangaroojump.title: KangarooJump

mailgun.author: Frédéric Guillot
mailgun.description:
Use the [Mailgun](https://www.mailgun.com) API to send emails and create tasks from emails. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin connects to a third party service.
mailgun.title: Mailgun

Mailmagik.author: Craig Crosby & Alfred Bühler
Mailmagik.description:
Connect Kanboard to an IMAP server to recieve emails and automatically convert emails to tasks or comments. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin may require extra configuration to your application.
Mailmagik.title: Mailmagik

MarkdownPlus.author: Craig Crosby & Tomas Dittmann
MarkdownPlus.description: Improved Markdown, with check boxes, emoji shortcode, inline html, etc.
MarkdownPlus.title: MarkdownPlus

mathjaxForKanboard.author: Michael Zauner
mathjaxForKanboard.description:
Adds [MathJax](https://www.mathjax.org) (a JavaScript display engine for mathematics that works in all browsers) capabilites to your Kanboard. Use `$$ \alpha $$` for inline math and `$$$ \beta $$$` for block math. 
 
 ⚠️  This plugin uses a CDN to fetch the required JS files for MathJax.
mathjaxForKanboard.title: Add MathJax to Kanboard

MatomoConnector.author: aljawaid
MatomoConnector.description: Connect your Kanboard instance to [Matomo Analytics](https://matomo.org) to track visitors to your site. Set the standard tracking code or use the optional JavaScript fallback code with further options for image tracking.
MatomoConnector.title: MatomoConnector

matrix.author: Chris Metz
matrix.description: Send Kanboard notifications to [Matrix Synapse](https://matrix.org/docs/projects/server/synapse) (federated messaging platform).
matrix.title: Matrix

mattermost.author: Frédéric Guillot
mattermost.description: Send Kanboard notifications to [Mattermost](https://mattermost.com) (selfhosted Slack clone).
mattermost.title: Mattermost

metadata.author: BlueTeck
metadata.description:
This plugin adds a GUI to manage custom metadata for task, projects and user. 
 
 ⚠️  Replaced by [MetaMagik](https://github.com/creecros/MetaMagik).
metadata.title: Metadata Manager

metamagik.author: Craig Crosby + BlueTeck
metamagik.description: Custom Fields and advanced GUI for managing them, along with [Metadata](https://github.com/BlueTeck/kanboard_plugin_metadata).
metamagik.title: metaMagik

milestone.author: Olivier Maridat
milestone.description: Add a section for milestones to show their related tasks.
milestone.title: Milestone

moon.author: Valentino Pesce
moon.description: Theme with a modern design that adds syntax highlighting for Markdown code, compatible with the [Customizer](https://github.com/creecros/Customizer) plugin.
moon.title: Moon

moveondate.author: David Morlitz
moveondate.description: Adds an Automatic Action which allows you to move cards to a specific column when the due date has passed.
moveondate.title: Move cards to specific columns when due date passed

nebula.author: Valentino Pesce
nebula.description: Theme with a modern design that adds syntax highlighting for Markdown code, compatible with the [Customizer](https://github.com/creecros/Customizer) plugin.
nebula.title: Nebula

offline.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
offline.description: This plugin is used to automatically alert users when they've lost internet connectivity.
offline.title: Offline

Outlook.author: Siddharth Kaul
Outlook.description: Get all the event notification in Microsoft Outlook as an incoming webhook email.
Outlook.title: Recieve Notification in Outlook

overwrite_translation.author: BlueTeck
overwrite_translation.description: Overwrite default translations without touching Kanboard files.
overwrite_translation.title: Overwrite Translation

oxygen.author: Valentino Pesce
oxygen.description: Replaces the logo and adds syntax highlighting for Markdown code.
oxygen.title: Oxygen

PAM.author: Tomas Dittmann
PAM.description: Add hide/show/delete buttons for administrators for every event on activity streams.
PAM.title: Project activity modifier

PersianBoard.author: Hamid Kord
PersianBoard.description: Make Kanboard compatible with the Iranian Calendar (Persian or Jalali calendar) and support RTL (right to left) direction.
PersianBoard.title: Persian Board

PITM.author: Tomas Dittmann
PITM.description:
Allow to paste images directly into textareas at the caret position. 
 
 ⚠️  Requires [MarkdownPlus](https://github.com/creecros/MarkdownPlus/releases).
PITM.title: Paste image to markdown

PluginManager.author: aljawaid
PluginManager.description:
Use an improved user-friendly layout for handling plugins. All plugins are broken down into a new structure to help users troubleshoot plugin-related problems. New features include listing and installing Manual Plugins both locally and remotely. 
 
 The new Plugin Problems section lists information on how to troubleshoot issues with plugins adding quick links to [KanboardSupport](https://github.com/aljawaid/KanboardSupport) and [ContentCleaner](https://github.com/aljawaid/ContentCleaner) to extend troubleshooting the whole application. 
 
 **Make PluginManager your must-have plugin to extend Kanboard more efficiently.**
PluginManager.title: PluginManager

pushdate.author: David Morlitz
pushdate.description: Adds an Automatic Action which allows you to push the due date a specified number of days when moving cards to a specific column.
pushdate.title: Push out due date on cards when moving to specific columns

quabdd.author: Quamob
quabdd.description: This plugin give you an new interface that help you create Gherkin tests for a task.
quabdd.title: QuaBDD

quacicd.author: Quamob
quacicd.description: This plugin allow you to execute automated deployment in qualification and production directly on your board.
quacicd.title: QuaCICD

RCB.author: Tomas Dittmann
RCB.description: Make codeblocks resizable, scrollable and also initially limit their height to 200px.
RCB.title: Resizable codeblocks

registration.author: Frédéric Guillot
registration.description: Self-registration plugin to allow people to sign up on Kanboard.
registration.title: Self-Registration

relationgraph.author: BlueTeck, Xavier Vidal
relationgraph.description: Show relations between tasks using a graph library.
relationgraph.title: Relationgraph

rocketchat.author: Frédéric Guillot, Olivier Maridat
rocketchat.description: Receive individual or project notifications on [RocketChat](https://www.rocket.chat).
rocketchat.title: RocketChat

s3.author: Frédéric Guillot
s3.description: This plugin stores uploaded files to Amazon S3 instead of storing files on the local file system.
s3.title: Amazon S3 Storage

search.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
search.description: This Plugin is created for advanced fulltext search within all projects. The search will be performed in the task title, task description, task comments, subtask title(s) and in attachments. All 5 filters can be turned on or off in the Kanboard Settings page.
search.title: Search plugin

slack.author: Frédéric Guillot
slack.description: Receive individual or project notifications on [Slack](https://slack.com).
slack.title: Slack

SortBoardByDates.author: Manfred Hoffmann
SortBoardByDates.description: Allows boards to be sorted by different dates (Date due, started, created, modified, moved, closed) or in Kanboard default mode).
SortBoardByDates.title: Sort Board By Dates for kanboard

soundnotification.author: Valentino Pesce
soundnotification.description: Each new notification will sound an alert sound.
soundnotification.title: SoundNotification

spectre.author: Viggo
spectre.description: Modern and simple CSS theme for Kanboard.
spectre.title: Spectre Theme

starredprojects.author: BibLibre
starredprojects.description: Mark projects as favorite for faster access in the dashboard.
starredprojects.title: Starred Projects

StartedDateOnCard.author: Tagirijus
StartedDateOnCard.description: This plugin adds a visual hint on a card, if it has a start date.
StartedDateOnCard.title: StartedDateOnCard

subtaskdate.author: Manuel Raposo & Craig Crosby
subtaskdate.description: This plugin adds a Due Date to subtasks.
subtaskdate.title: SubtaskDueDate

subtaskdescription.author: Shaun Fong
subtaskdescription.description: This plugin adds markdown description to subtasks.
subtaskdescription.title: SubtaskDescription

SubtasksOnBoard.author: JustFxDev (Fx), rfde
SubtasksOnBoard.description: Display subtasks of a task on the task cards on a board and run, start or clear them directly on the task card.
SubtasksOnBoard.title: Subtasks on Board

synologychat.author: Paul Sweeney
synologychat.description: Receive individual or project notifications on [Synology Chat](https://www.synology.com/en-us/dsm/feature/chat).
synologychat.title: SynologyChat

TableView.author: greyaz
TableView.description: A Kanboard plugin that provides a table view of tasks in your project.
TableView.title: TableView

TagManager.author: aljawaid
TagManager.description: Use tags like you have never used them before. This plugin revamps the whole project and global tags concept to provide the user with a clearer process of creating and associating tags to better improve their workflow.
TagManager.title: TagManager

Task2pdf.author: Craig Crosby
Task2pdf.description: Create a printer friendly PDF of a task.
Task2pdf.title: Task2pdf

TaskAssignPriorityToCategory.author: Manfred Hoffmann
TaskAssignPriorityToCategory.description: Adds an Automatic Action to assign a priority based on a category.
TaskAssignPriorityToCategory.title: TaskAssignPriorityToCategory

TaskAutoColor.author: Tagirijus
TaskAutoColor.description: This plugin automatic colorizes the task according to its priority.
TaskAutoColor.title: TaskAutoColor

TaskButtonsReposition.author: Andrei Volgin, ipunkt Business Solutions
TaskButtonsReposition.description: Some action buttons are duplicated from the sidebar list to the corresponding accordion section in the task view.
TaskButtonsReposition.title: Task Buttons Reposition

TaskIcons.author: Tagirijus
TaskIcons.description: This plugin simply changes the started date icon from the clock to a play symbol.
TaskIcons.title: TaskIcons

TaskProgressBar.author: Valentino Pesce
TaskProgressBar.description: Show the progress bar of subtasks from the bulletin board.
TaskProgressBar.title: TaskProgressBar

telegram.author: Manu Varkey
telegram.description: Receive individual or project notifications on [Telegram](https://telegram.org).
telegram.title: Telegram

TemplateManager.author: aljawaid
TemplateManager.description:
Predefined Contents is replaced to improve consistency of your project data and save time for repetitive comments using saved templates. 
 
 Templates can be created for task descriptions (core feature), comments (new feature), global templates (new feature) and email subjects (core feature) all in one place including adding notes and instructions separate to the template content to help keep content neat. 
 
 The global templates feature shows for every project and can be used as a way to guide and advise users within tasks.  Project Editors can create, update and delete templates for each project. Templates can also be useful in environments where policy compliance or auditing is required.
TemplateManager.title: TemplateManager

ThemeMaestro.author: JustFxDev (Fx)
ThemeMaestro.description: A colorful theme to refresh the interface providing different color schemes. Supports the [Customizer](https://github.com/creecros/Customizer) plugin.
ThemeMaestro.title: ThemeMaestro

ThemeRevision.author: greyaz
ThemeRevision.description: A 'task-first' and high-quality theme for Kanboard. It's aimed at better mobile experiences, common plugins' compatibilities, and customization friendly.
ThemeRevision.title: ThemeRevision for Kanboard

timeintervalbutton.author: Igor Mroz
timeintervalbutton.description: Simple plugin which adds a button to incrementally change the time spent on a task.
timeintervalbutton.title: Task Interval Button

TimeMachine.author: Yohann Valentin
TimeMachine.description: Add more analytics times datas like time comparison by swimlanes, categories and by dates (only spent time) and an edit form on subtask time tracking.
TimeMachine.title: Plugin to add time machine : Back to the Future

timetrackingeditor.author: Stinnux
timetrackingeditor.description: Manually add and edit time tracking entries, add comments and select billable/not billable to time tracking entries. Export time tracking entries as HTML.
timetrackingeditor.title: Time Tracking Editor

TNID.author: Tomas Dittmann
TNID.description: Show the task number in the task details, so if you use the [MinimizeSidebar](https://github.com/kenlog/MinimizeSidebar) plugin, you can still see the task number.
TNID.title: Task number in details

updatenotifier.author: Valentino Pesce
updatenotifier.description: The Update Notifier is a utility that scans installed plugin and displays a list of updates.
updatenotifier.title: UpdateNotifier

URLCleaner.author: aljawaid
URLCleaner.description:
This simple tool extends the rewriting of browser URLs for your Kanboard application. Sanitize those long URLs automatically creating neat pretty easy to remember bookmarks. This plugin extends URLs from the core and from plugins. Works with [Bigboard](https://github.com/TimoStahl/kanboard_plugin_bigboard), [Wiki](https://github.com/funktechno/kanboard-plugin-wiki), [Calendar](https://github.com/kanboard/plugin-calendar), [MetaMagik](https://github.com/creecros/MetaMagik) plugins. 
 
 ⚠️  URL Rewriting must be [correctly configured](https://docs.kanboard.org/v1/admin/url-rewriting/) for this plugin to function properly.
URLCleaner.title: URLCleaner

WechatWorkNotifier.author: greyaz
WechatWorkNotifier.description: Receive notifications on [Wechat Work (企业微信)](https://work.weixin.qq.com) aka Wecom.
WechatWorkNotifier.title: Wechat Work Notifier

WeeklyRecurringTasks.author: Sebastian Pape, Sebastien Diot
WeeklyRecurringTasks.description: Automatically clones tasks with the `DAILY`/`WEEKLY`/`BIWEEKLY` or `MONDAY`/`TUESDAY`/`WEDNESDAY`/`THURSDAY`/`FRIDAY`/`SATURDAY`/`SUNDAY` tag.
WeeklyRecurringTasks.title: Duplicate Tasks by nightly Cron Job

weightedvoting.author: Manel Perez
weightedvoting.description: Weighted voting for the evaluation of group activities in Kanboard.
weightedvoting.title: Weighted voting

WeKanboard.author: Benno Waldhauer
WeKanboard.description: Yet another theme for Kanboard. Strongly inspired by the style of Wekan. Supports the [Customizer](https://github.com/creecros/Customizer) plugin.
WeKanboard.title: WeKanboard

zulip.author: Peter Fejer
zulip.description: Receive individual or project notifications on [Zulip](https://zulip.com).
zulip.title: Zulip
